1.0.2.name: wordpress/s9-egoi-email-sender-and-subscribe-form
1.0.2.description:
This plugin allows you to use some of the API functions provided by E-Goi (http://e-goi.com/s/e-goi/40301803c0) inside WordPress. With this plugin you can: * Create Email Marketing Campaign using wordpress editor. * Send Email campaings to your mailinglists. * Create automatic newsletters with the latests posts published in your Blog (Based on the numbe of posts). * Place a widget in your blog with a fully configurable subscribption form. * Sync registered wordpress users to a E-Goi List.

NOTE: Don't have a E-Goi account, register one for FREE (http://e-goi.com/s/e-goi/40301803c0) With a free account you can send unlimited Email Marketing Campaigns up to 500 subscribers.
